Ranbir Kapoor And Alia Bhatt To Get Engaged After The Release Of Their Film 'Brahmastra'
Ranbir Kapoor And Alia Bhatt To Get Engaged After The Release Of Their Film 'Brahmastra'
Bollywood couple Ranbir Kapoor and Alia Bhatt are the IT couple of the country. The two fell in love during the sets of their upcoming film, Brahmastra. After breaking up with Katrina Kaif, Ranbir Kapoor found solace in Alia and the two are giving major relationship goals.
Twitter
From being spotted in New York, hanging out with papa Rishi Kapoor to arriving hand-in-hand at Sonam's wedding to putting out with sweetest birthday wish on Instagram, Alia Bhatt is leaving no stone unturned in making this relationship more than perfect.
And now as per reports in Filmfare, Ranbir’s mother Neetu wants the couple to exchange rings this June, but the couple wants to take it easy till the much anticipated release of the Ayan Mukerji's film that also stars Amitabh Bachchan.
